page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE IN SEASCALE
page.content: I get up at 8.00 and dress.I eat my breakfast, which is sausage sandwiches .When my mum is out of the bathroom I get a wash and clean my teeth.Once I have done that,I brush my hair.My dad works shifts,so my mum and Auntie take it in turns to take me and my cousins to school.I arive at school about 8.45,I get out my cello,and walk round to the playground and talk to my friends till 9.00.We go in,take off our coats and hang up our bags.We go up the corridor and get out our hymn books for Assembly.We come back and work till 10.30 which is playtime. After play we work again till dinner time.We all make a rush down to the dinner hall.When we have finished we go outside to play.When we come in Igo to my cello lessons.After that I work till 2.15,and then again till hometime which is at 3.30.
